channel.description: does ne1 no how i make it so that after u kill jad the fire cape goes into ur invo and u get tellyed out...im 80% done my mini game and jad is the only part i need.... plz help thnx

item.title: Need help coding custom mini game
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

In NPCHandler, search for:

public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCID) {

Then, in that method, under this:

if (npcs[NPCID] != null && server.playerHandler.players[Play] != null) {

Add this:

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { C.addItem(6570, 1); C.teleportToX = ####; C.teleportToY = ####; }

Replace the ‘####’ with the Coords you wish to teleport to after Tzok-Jad is killed.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help coding custom mini game
